translation.Message_0_Page_0: The <color=red>Irish Freedom Republic</color>, or the <color=red>IFR</color> for most people, is the remnants of a militia that formed approximately around the time Ireland got fully infected.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We were attempting to use the turmoil caused by the infection to reunify Ireland. At first, we were really succesful. We even controlled the entirety of Belfast.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Now, I'm not so sure. The limited connection between settlements has given us radio silence. All we know for now is that the <color=blue>Coalition</color> are messing up our plan!
